recipe.title: One-Pan Lemon Pepper Chicken Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 ; lemon, half for the juice, half for slices

steps.step: Place asparagus into mixing bowl and thoroughly coat with olive oil, salt, pepper, and garlic.
Tear off a sheet of parchment paper, large enough to fold into a packet.
Place asparagus and chicken breast on top of parchment paper. Season with salt, pepper, oregano, and lemon juice. Garnish with 2-3 lemon slices.
Fold the edges of the parchment paper widthwise 2-3 times then twist the ends until fully closed.
Bake for 20-25 minutes or until internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).

steps_updated.steps_updated: Place asparagus into mixing bowl and thoroughly coat with olive oil, salt, pepper, and garlic.
Tear off a sheet of parchment paper, large enough to fold into a packet.
Place asparagus and chicken breast on top of parchment paper.
Season with salt, pepper, oregano, and lemon juice.
Fold the edges of the parchment paper widthwise 2-3 times then twist the ends until fully closed.
Bake for 20-25 minutes or until internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
